search.query: index=route_stats OR (index=siri planned_start_time!=22* planned_start_time!=23* planned_start_time!=00* planned_start_time!=01* lat!=0.0) AND ($route_id$ agency_id=$agency_id$) | eventstats first(start_stop_lat) as start_stop_lat first(start_stop_lon) as start_stop_lon by route_id date | search index=siri | eval distance = sqrt(pow((start_stop_lat-lat)*0.89, 2)+pow((start_stop_lon-lon)*1.08, 2))*100000 | eval dist_time = distance."_".time_recorded | streamstats min(distance) as min_dist by route_id bus_id planned_start_time date | eventstats earliest(time_recorded) as earliest_time_recorded earliest(distance) as earliest_distance dc(time_recorded) as points by route_id bus_id planned_start_time date | sort 0 min_dist time_recorded | streamstats count by route_id bus_id planned_start_time date | where count<=20 and distance>200 and distance>=min_dist | stats first(time_recorded) as departure_time_estimated first(distance) as distance first(earliest_time_recorded) as earliest_time_recorded first(earliest_distance) as earliest_distance first(points) as points by route_id date planned_start_time bus_id route_short_name | convert dur2sec(planned_start_time) AS psts dur2sec(departure_time_estimated) AS trs dur2sec(earliest_time_recorded) as ftrs | eval late_sec = trs-psts | eval earliest_late_sec = ftrs-psts | eval late=tostring(late_sec, "duration"), earliest_late=tostring(earliest_late_sec, "duration") | fields route_short_name route_id date bus_id planned_start_time points departure_time_estimated late distance earliest_time_recorded earliest_late earliest_distance psts trs ftrs late_sec earliest_late_sec
| tstats sum(num_trips) as count where index=route_stats by agency_name agency_id | eval desc = agency_name." (".agency_id.")" | sort -count

| tstats count where index="route_stats" agency_id=$agency_id$ by start_stop_city | rename start_stop_city as stop_city | append [| tstats count where index="route_stats" agency_id=$agency_id$ by end_stop_city | rename end_stop_city as stop_city] | stats count by stop_city
| tstats count where index="route_stats" AND agency_id=$agency_id$ AND (start_stop_city=$stop_city$ OR end_stop_city=$stop_city$) by route_short_name

| tstats count max(num_trips) as num_trips first(route_long_name) as route_long_name where index="route_stats" AND $route_short_name$ AND agency_id=$agency_id$ AND (start_stop_city=$stop_city$ OR end_stop_city=$stop_city$) by agency_name route_short_name route_id | eval description = "מזהה ".route_id." - ".num_trips." נסיעות - ".route_long_name." - קו ".route_short_name | sort -num_trips

| stats count(eval(( (points<=15) ))) as few_points count(eval(( (late_sec>=60*6) and (late_sec<60*10) and (distance<=500) and (points>15) ))) as late6 count(eval(( (late_sec>=60*10) and (distance<=500) and (points>15) ))) as late10 count(eval(( (late_sec>=60*6) and (late_sec<60*10) and (distance>500) and (points>15) ))) as late6_far count(eval(( (late_sec>=60*10) and (distance>500) and (points>15) ))) as late10_far count(eval(( (late_sec<=-60*1) and (distance<=500) and (points>15) ))) as early count(eval(( (late_sec<=-60*1) and (distance>500) and (points>15) ))) as early_far count(eval(( (earliest_late_sec>=60*6) and (earliest_late_sec<60*10) and (points>15) ))) as earliest_late6 count(eval(( (earliest_late_sec>=60*10) and (points>15) ))) as earliest_late10 count(eval(( (earliest_late_sec>=60*6) and (earliest_late_sec<60*10) and (earliest_distance<=500) and (points>15) ))) as earliest_late6_far count(eval(( (earliest_late_sec>=60*10) and (earliest_distance<=500) and (points>15) ))) as earliest_late10_far count by route_short_name route_id | join route_id [search index=route_stats ($route_id$ agency_id=$agency_id$) | makemv delim=";" all_start_time | mvexpand all_start_time | search all_start_time!=23* all_start_time!=22* all_start_time!=00* all_start_time!=01* | stats count as gtfs_trips by route_id] | rename count as siri_rides | eval siri_rides_no_few = count - few_points | eval few_points=round(few_points/gtfs_trips, 3), late6=round(late6/gtfs_trips, 3), late10=round(late10/gtfs_trips, 3), late6_far=round(late6_far/gtfs_trips, 3), late10_far=round(late10_far/gtfs_trips, 3), early=round(early/gtfs_trips, 3), early_far=round(early_far/gtfs_trips, 3), earliest_late6=round(earliest_late6/gtfs_trips, 3), earliest_late10=round(earliest_late10/gtfs_trips, 3), earliest_late6_far=round(earliest_late6_far/gtfs_trips, 3), earliest_late10_far=round(earliest_late10_far/gtfs_trips, 3) | eval ride_to_trip_ratio = round(siri_rides/gtfs_trips, 3) | eval no_few_to_trip_ratio = round(siri_rides_no_few/gtfs_trips, 3)
